name: Medma Infomatix Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: it, software-development, android, iphone, air, blackberry, php, ajax, jquery, flash, flex, sql, sqllite, symbian, out-sourcing
overview:
Medma is a IT Software Development Company.

Medma Infomatix Private Limited is one of the fastest growing IT company in the region which provides quality web & mobile solutions to its clients worldwide. No matter in which part of the world you are located, we provide you our expertised services by utilising the power of next generation technologies. Till date we have completed hundreds of projects in USA, UK, AUSTRALIA, CANADA, SWEDEN, ITALY, DENMARK, FIJI, THAILAND, MAURITIUS, AUSTRIA, SWITZERLAND and in many other parts of the world.

We have talented brains from premier institutes with sufficient practical experience in the industry. Each professional has certain expertise in his specific area, helping him to serve the client in a better way. Be it Graphic design, Web development, Games, Mobile applications, Medma Infomatix can take care of it all with professional finesse and competence.

We place great emphasis on customer’s requirement and try to give them quality services. Our aim is to achieve total customer delight by superseding the customer’s expectations. For knowing more about our services you should check Staffing, Virtual Assistance & Support services websites.

We only do what we are expert in doing. We are not “jack of all trade” IT company. We are expert in using open source technologies to develop profitable, robust & scalable solutions for web, mobile and desktops.
